markdown.markdown:
<!--Include academic icons or buttons-->

{{< include /files/includes/_academic.qmd >}}

My work has been published in the *Economic Journal*, *Journal of Public Economics*, *Journal of Health Economics*, *Journal of Population Economics*, *American Journal of Agricultural Economcis*, *Social Science & Medicine*, and *JAMA Network Open*.

You can find my recent [CV](files/Wei-Fu-CV.pdf){.external target="_blank"} and [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=m8-eoB8AAAAJ&hl=en) here.

```{=html}
<!--
   \[Econ\]: Economics journals; all authors are ordered alphabetically.\
   \[PH\]: Public health journals; all authors are ordered by contributions.\
   \[Med\]: Medical journals; all authors are ordered by contributions.\
 -->
```

<!-- - Total citations as of January 2025: -->

<!-- -   [Web of Science](https://www.webofscience.com/wos/author/record/N-4549-2013): 3,000 (h-index = 26)\  -->

<!-- -   [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=vf90AuEAAAAJ): 5,000 (h-index = 33, i10-index = 57) -->


Notes: \* corresponding author; <sup>+</sup> first author; <sup>++</sup> co-first author; <sup>GS</sup> graduate student advisee.   

\[12\] Erkmen G. Aslim, **Wei Fu**, Erdal Tekin, and Shijun You. 2025. From Syringes to Dishes: Improving Food Security through Vaccination. *Journal of Public Economics* 247:105392. [Published version](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0047272725000908?utm_campaign=STMJ_219742_AUTH_SERV_PA&utm_medium=email&utm_acid=194150690&SIS_ID=&dgcid=STMJ_219742_AUTH_SERV_PA&CMX_ID=&utm_in=DM567183&utm_source=AC_), [NBER WP 31025](https://www.nber.org/papers/w31045)

\[11\] **Wei Fu**<sup>+</sup>, Melissa B. Eggen, and Qi Zheng. 2025. The 2005 TennCare Disenrollments Increased Rates of Intimate Partner Violence: Insights for the Post-COVID Medicaid Unwinding. *Health Services Research* 20:e14647. [Published version](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/1475-6773.14647?msockid=33ac7d22ec1b6b8a0c046e77ed746ab0)

\[10\] Ashley Bradford, **Wei Fu**\*, and Shijun You. 2024. The Devastating Dance between Opioid and Housing Crises: Evidence from OxyContin Reformulation. *Journal of Health Economics* 98:102930. [Published version](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0167629624000754)

\[9\] Erkmen G. Aslim, **Wei Fu**, Chia-Lun Liu, and Erdal Tekin. 2024. State Vaccination Policies, Delayed Care, and Health Expenditures. *Economic Journal* 134(664):3096-136. [Published version](https://academic.oup.com/ej/article/134/664/3096/7701410).

\[8\] **Wei Fu**<sup>+</sup>, Li-San Wang, and Shin-Yi Chou. 2024. A Single Dose For Me, A Wealth of Protection For Us: The Public Health Cost of Individualism in the Rollout of COVID-19 Vaccine. *Social Science & Medicine* 348:116849. [Published version](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0277953624002934)

\[7\] Yuanyuan Chen and **Wei Fu**. 2023. Migration Control Policy and Parent-Child Separation among Migrant Families: Evidence from China. *Journal of Population Economics* 36(4):2347-2388. [Published version](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00148-023-00971-z)

\[6\] **Wei Fu**, Chen Huang and Feng Liu. 2023. Unemployment Benefits, Food Insecurity, and Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program Spending. *American Journal of Agricultural Economics* 105(2):479-502. [Published version](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/ajae.12322)

\[5\] Kaylyn Clark, **Wei Fu**<sup>++</sup>, Chia-Lun Liu, Pei-Chuan Ho, Hui Wang, Wan-Ping Lee, Shin-Yi Chou, Li-San Wang, Jung-Ying Tzeng. 2023. The Prediction of Alzheimer’s Disease through Multi-Trait Genetic Modeling. *Frontiers in Aging Neuroscience* 15:1168638. [Published version](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fnagi.2023.1168638/full)

\[4\] Dhaval Dave, **Wei Fu**, and Muzhe Yang. 2023. Mental Distress Among Female Individuals of Reproductive Age and Reported Barriers to Legal Abortion Following the US Supreme Court Decision to Overturn Roe v Wade. *JAMA Network Open* , 6(3):e234509-e234509. [Published version](https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jamanetworkopen/fullarticle/2802750)

\[3\] Pavel P. Kuksa, Chia-Lun Liu, **Wei Fu**<sup>++</sup>, Liming Qu, Yi Zhao, Zivadin Katanic, Amanda B Kuzma, Pei-Chuan Ho, Kai-Teh Tzeng, Otto Valladares, Shin-Yi Chou, Adam C Naj, Gerard D Schellenberg, Li-San Wang, and Yuk Yee Leung. 2022. Alzheimer’s Disease Variant Portal (ADVP): A Catalog of Genetic Findings for Alzheimer’s Disease. *Journal of Alzheimer’s Disease* 86:461–477. [Published version](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.3233/JAD-215055)

\[2\] **Wei Fu**<sup>++</sup>, Pei-Chuan Ho, Chia-Lun Liu, Kai-Teh Tzeng, Nawar Nayeem, Jonni S. Moore, Li-San Wang, and Shin-Yi Chou. 2021. Reconcile the Debate Over Protective Effects of BCG Vaccine against COVID-19. *Scientific Reports* 11(1):8356. [Published version](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-021-87731-9)

\[1\] **Wei Fu** and Feng Liu. 2019. Unemployment Insurance and Cigarette Smoking. *Journal of Health Economics* 63:34-51. [Published version](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-023-40337-3)

## Working Paper

**Wei Fu** and Ashley C. Bradford. 2025. Capping the First Script: Initial Opioid Prescription Limits and Intimate Partner Violence. R&R at *Journal of Health Economics*

**Wei Fu**<sup>+</sup>, Shin-Yi Chou, and Li-San Wang. 2022. NIH Grant Expansion, Ancestral Diversity and Scientific Discovery in Genomics Research. [NBER Working Paper No. 30155](https://www.nber.org/papers/w30155). R&R at *Journal of Population Economics*

Shijun You, **Wei Fu**, and Shin-Yi Chou. 2025. Local problems, local solutions: Evidence from the Drug-Free Communities program on Youth Development. [NBER Working Paper No. 34182](https://www.nber.org/papers/w34182). Submitted.

**Wei Fu** and Muzhe Yang. 2025. Protecting Children through Paid Family Leave: Reduced Child Maltreatment in the Short- and Long-Run.

**Wei Fu** and Muzhe Yang. 2025. Homes in Limbo, Children at Risk: Exploring the Link between Housing Instability and Child Maltreatment Using the Discontinuity of the Protecting Tenants at Foreclosure Act. *Submitted*

Erkmen G. Aslim, **Wei Fu**, Caitlin Myers, Erdal Tekin, and Bingjin Xue. 2025. Abortion, Economic Hardship, and Crime.

**Wei Fu**<sup>+</sup>, Seyed Karimi, Hamid Zarei, and Xi Chen. 2024. The Inclusion of ADRD Hierarchical Condition Category in Medicare Advantage Risk Adjustment Model is Associated with Improved Access to Healthcare.

Qingwei Wang, **Wei Fu**, Huixin Zhong, Kexin Bao, and Jiawei Cao. 2024. Improving Fairness in Aging-Related AI: A Conceptual Model for Mitigating Biases. *Submitted*

Aslim Erkmen, **Wei Fu**, and Erdal Tekin. 2024. Proximity to Abortion Services and Child Maltreatment. [National Bureau of Economic Research No. w32771](https://www.nber.org/papers/w32771)

**Wei Fu**, Chen Huang, and Feng Liu. 2024. Excise Tax and the Take-Up of Public Health Insurance: Evidence from Cigarette Tax Hikes.

**Wei Fu**<sup>++</sup>, Shin-Yi Chou, Li-San Wang, Chia-Lun Liu, and Pei-Chuan Ho. 2022. The Interplay of Extraversion Genes and Childhood Environment in Occupational Sorting.

## Peer-Reviewed Chinese Journals

\[Econ\] Yuanyuan Chen and **Wei Fu**. 2023. Migration Control Policy in Megalopolis, School Enrollment Requirement and Children Left-behind. (特大城市人口调控政策、入学门槛与儿童留守). China Economic Quarterly (经济学(季刊)).

\[Econ\] Yuanyuan Chen and **Wei Fu**. 2017. Land Transfer Right, Rural-to-Urban Migration and Agricultural Production. (土地承包经营权流转、劳动力流动与农业生产). Management World (管理世界).

\[Econ\] Feng Huang and **Wei Fu**. 2017. Purchased by Government or Provided by Family? Estimating the Substitution Effects of Informal Care. (政府购买还是家庭照料? 基于家庭照料替代效应的实证分析). Nankai Economic Studies (南开经济研究).

\[Econ\] Zhaohua Li and **Wei Fu**. 2013. Ecological Footprint Analysis of the China’s International Trade. (中国进出口贸易内涵自然资本的生态足迹分析). China Industrial Economics (中国工业经济).
